desc: Looking for bicycle accessories? Check out our soft, absorbent grip covers for cyclists of all levels looking to add some comfort and flair to their commutes and biking adventures. Affordable, reusable and machine washable, by Pedaler Grip Covers.

layout.text: CLEAN, COMFY GRIP COVERS FOR BIKERS OF ALL LEVELS
WHETHER YOU'RE A CYCLING ENTHUSIAST OR A BEGINNER, OUR GRIP COVERS WILL MAKE YOUR RIDE MORE COMFORTABLE
